name: Dark Age of Camelot: Trials of Atlantis
name_original: Dark Age of Camelot: Trials of Atlantis
description:
Dark Age of Camelot: Trials of Atlantis is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Mythic Entertainment. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Vivendi Universal Games. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Dark Age of Camelot: Trials of Atlantis is available on PC.
